footer.basedOn: Based on the Excel app by

error.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.

setup.enableNotificationsDescription: Do you want to receive notifications? You can later change this setting and can disable notifications at any time.

nav.offline: The connection to the server has been lost. The connection will be restored automatically once it is available again.

errors.notSupported: Notifications are not supported by this browser. Probably this website needs to be installed onto the homescreen.

notGranted.title: Notification permission not granted
notGranted.description: To receive notifications, you must activate this in the system settings or reinstall the app.

notify.title: Notify me when...
notify.eventStart: an event I am registered for starts
notify.eventUpdated: an event I am registered for is updated
notify.timeslotStart: a timeslot I am registered for starts

events.userIsEditingAlready:
{{alias}} is already editing the groups for the event.
The groups can only be edited by one person at a time.

Please consult with {{alias}}. If in doubt, you can also remove {{alias}} from the edit mode.

Important: Please note that all changes made by {{alias}} will be lost.
events.removeFromEditingBy: You have been removed from edit mode by {{alias}}.

timeslot.noPlayers: For this timeslot, no players have registered yet.
timeslot.isFallbackAllowed: Players can define a fallback timeslot
timeslot.playerAdded: Player has been added to this timeslot

playerRemoveDialog.message: Do you really want to remove the player from this timeslot?
playerRemoveDialog.playerRemoved: Player has been removed from this timeslot

error.playerRemoved: Error while removing Ppayer from timeslot

error.playerAdded: Error while adding player to timeslot

deleteDialog.title: Delete event
deleteDialog.text: Are you sure you want to delete event {{date}}?

deleteTimeslotDialog.title: Delete timeslot
deleteTimeslotDialog.text: Are you sure you want to delete timeslot {{time}}?

deletePreconfigDialog.title: Delete preconfigured group
deletePreconfigDialog.text: Are you sure you want to delete preconfigured group with {{playerIds.length}} players?

startDialog.title: Start event
startDialog.text: Are you sure you want to start event {{date}}? The groups cannot be changed after the event has started.

commitDialog.title: Commit event
commitDialog.text: Do you really want to release the event {{date}}? The time slots can no longer be adjusted and players will be notified of a new event

warning.notStartableNoInstances: The event cannot be started because the groups have not been built yet.
warning.notStartableMissingMap: The event cannot be started because not all played timeslots have a map assigned.

error.addPlayerToPreconfig: Failed to add player to preconfigured group.
error.removePlayerFromPreconfig: Failed to remove player from preconfigured group.
error.setEditingInstances: Error when claiming the editing of groups.

deleteDialog.title: Delete map
deleteDialog.text: Are you sure you want to delete map "{{name}}"?

deleteDialog.title: Delete user
deleteDialog.text: Are you sure you want to delete user "{{alias}}"?

userWelcomeDialog.title: Welcome {{alias}}
userWelcomeDialog.welcomeMessage:
Hello dear minigolf friends!
Registration for Minigolf Friday is now possible via the web-based app, which you can download at:
{{url}}.
Save it as a bookmark or add it to your home screen so that you can access it at any time.
Please log in there with your password and register yourself for your game times.
Please still write in the Facebook post that you have registered so that the conversation is maintained there.
Have fun playing mini golf!
Your organization team

playerEvents.registrationClosed: The registration for this event is closed.
playerEvents.fallbackTimeslotDescription: This timeslot is not as popular as the others. It can happend that if too few peaple register for this timeslot, it will not take place. Therefore you can specify a fallback timeslot that will be used if this timeslot is canceled.

noGames.registered: The timeslot(s) for which you are registered will not take place because too few players have registered for it.
noGames.notRegistered: You have not registered for a timeslot.

warning.noFallbackTimeslot: Without a fallback timeslot your might not get into a game.

validation.afterRegistrationDeadline: Must be after the registration deadline.
